messages.content:
Categorize this IT Ticket:

license problem no free ticket available sent wednesday july license problem free ticket available importance high hi having problems with license getting message free ticket available unable work tx

message.reasoning:

The phrases "license problem" and "no free ticket available" seem to point towards access or purchase issues. The presence of "free ticket available" requires further scrutiny to determine if it is related to access or another category. I need to make sure to account for all of the phrases provided.
